abstract: The biggest force in digital advertising is getting ever bigger as the Publicis Groupe strikes a deal with Microsoft to buy Razorfish, the interactive agency that Microsoft has owned since acquiring aQuantive in 2007.
snippet: The biggest force in digital advertising is getting ever bigger as the Publicis Groupe strikes a deal with Microsoft to buy Razorfish, the interactive agency that Microsoft has owned since acquiring aQuantive in 2007.
lead_paragraph: The biggest force in digital advertising is getting ever bigger as the Publicis Groupe strikes a deal with Microsoft to buy Razorfish, the interactive agency that Microsoft has owned since acquiring aQuantive in 2007.

headline.main: Microsoft Sells Razorfish Digital Agency to the Publicis Groupe

abstract: The French company Publicis Groupe struck a deal Sunday to buy Razorfish, the interactive agency.
snippet: The French company Publicis Groupe struck a deal Sunday to buy Razorfish, the interactive agency.
lead_paragraph: The French advertising giant Publicis Groupe struck a deal Sunday to buy Razorfish, the interactive agency that Microsoft has owned since acquiring the agency’s parent company, aQuantive, in 2007.

headline.main: Microsoft to Sell Web Ad Agency
headline.print_headline: Microsoft to Sell Web Ad Agency
